title: Evangelism Opportunities for Kids
itunes:summary:
If you look for them, you can find opportunities to share the gospel every day. John and Danny discuss how to pass an evangelistic mindset on to your kids.

Get the book "Love Where You Live" for your donation of any amount:
https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-03-16?refcd=1080512

Get More Episode Resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/evangelism-opportunities-for-kids/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
